alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 6:00PM CDT until September 24 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tarrant County in north central Texas... Southwestern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Forest Hill, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Cedar Hill, Haltom City, Forest Hill, Kennedale, Everman, Rendon, Edgecliff Village, Pantego, Cedar Hill State Park, Edgecliff, Dalworthington Gardens, Lake Arlington, Joe Pool Lake, and Mountain Creek Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 43 and 48. Interstate 20 between mile markers 436 and 458. Interstate 30 between mile markers 16 and 30. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
